DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare ability Aquacel速 Ag Mepilex速 Border Ag manage bioburden leg ulcer two week study period .
DOC.brief_title: Compare Aquacel速 Ag Versus Mepilex速 Border Ag Manage Bioburden Leg Ulcers
DOC.criteria: Aged 18 year Willing able provide write informed consent Leg ulcer size range 10 cm2 40 cm2 moderate heavy exudate Leg ulcer exhibit least 2 4 follow clinical sign : pain 2 dressing change , periulcer skin erythema , oedema , foul odour Known skin sensitivity component product test Subjects current local systemic antibiotic and/or topical antimicrobial apply week prior inclusion Depth ulcer classify superficial ( involve dermis ) deep ( expose muscle tendon ) Any medical condition , accord investigator , justifies subject 's exclusion study Participated clinical study within past 30 day
